column2: "Nyimpa a ɔbaa wo no
column3: Ne nda kumaabi

column2: "Ɔba sor dɛ nhyiren
column3: na wotwa to famu: Oguan so dɛ nwinwin

column2: "Aso obi a ɔtse dɛm yi na ɔwo ibue w'enyiwa wɔ no do
column3: Na edze me kɔ w'enyim atsɛmbu mu yi?"

column2: "Woana na obotum dze adze a no ho tsew efi dza no ho nntsew mu aba? Oho
column3: obiara runntum."

column2: "Osiandɛ ne nda wɔahyɛ ato hɔ
column3: n'abosoom no dodow wɔ wo hɔ
column4: Na ɔwo etwa no he a orunntum nntra;"

column2: "Yi w'enyi fi no do
column3: ma ɔnhom
column4: Nkodu dɛ obowie ne da dɛ paanyi."

column2: "Na dua mpo enyidado wɔ ho
column3: dɛ sɛ wotwa kyen a
column5: Na no nkorbata fɔr no remmpa."

column2: "Kaansa no ndwow yɛ dadaw wɔ dɛtse mu
column3: Na no dusin wu wɔ famu mpo a:"

column2: "Ɔnam nsu na hua do ɔbɛfefɛw
column3: Na oeyiyi abaw dɛ dua a wɔatsɛw."

column2: "Na nyimpa dze owu na ɔbea hɔ
column3: Nyew

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ nsu fi po mu kɔ no
column3: Na esutsen huam

column2: "Dɛmara so na nyimpa da hɔ na ɔnnsoɛr: Ɔsor nnyae nntwaa mu yi worinnyan
column3: Na eso worummpusuw hɔn mmfi hɔn nda mu."

column2: "Ao
column3: kɛtseankyɛ ɔwoara edze me eehuntsa ekodu samanadze

column2: "Aso nyimpa wu a
column3: ɔbɛtsena ase bio anaa? Dɛm ntsi m'akodzi nda nyinara mobɔtweɔn

column2: "Ɔwo ebɛfrɛ
column3: na emi so magye wo do: Ibenya akɔndɔ wɔ wo nsaano edwuma ho."

column2: "Na afei dze ɔwo bɛkan m'anamɔn: Na erenntsɛw mo bɔn."
"Wɔasɔw me mbrato ano ahyɛ kotoku mu. Na ɔwo akyekyer m'emumuyɛ ano."
"Ampa bepɔw a orutu ahwe ase no
column3: ohi

column2: "Na nsu hi abo; Na ne nyirii hohor famu huntuma kɔ no
column3: Dɛmara so na ɔwo esɛɛ dasanyi n'enyidado;"

column2: "Idzi no do nyim koraa
column3: na otwa mu kɔ; Ɔwo esakyer n'enyim
column4: na igya no kwan ma ɔkɔ."

column2: "Sɛ ne mba ba nya enyimnyam mpo a
column3: onnyim; Na wɔbrɛ hɔn adze so a

column2: "Nankasa no honanyaw nko na ɔtse
column3: Na ne kra a ɔwɔ no mu so dzi yaw."
